nodes.text: A lake on the forest moon of Endor bore a mystical enchantment. Anyone who touched the water was magically teleported under the surface and trapped by a force field that only magical objects could penetrate. Mace Towani stumbled onto this lake and became trapped. He pounded helplessly on the surface of the water and shouted for help. Cindel Towani and her Ewok companions came to his aid, and eventually Wicket Wystri Warrick was able to rescue him by piercing the magic barrier with his magic walking stick.
